power.title: Charm of the Defender
power.fluff: You weave a skein of deceitful magic, tricking your foe to become a hero to its enemies

section.name: Target:
section.text: One enemy

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You slide the target up to 3 squares. You can resolve the rest of the power against the target even if you slide it outside the power's range.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: The target is deceived until the end of your next turn.

While deceived, the target is immobilized. When an enemy starts its turn adjacent to the deceived target, the target must make a melee basic attack against that enemy. It has a bonus to the attack roll and damage roll equal to your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Concussive Echo
power.fluff: A focused blast of thunder slams into your foe, and the energy of the blast is stored in your enemy's body so that it is released in a concussive burst

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3d6 + Intelligence modifier thunder damage.

The first time the target makes an attack before the end of your next turn, it deals thunder damage to itself and each enemy within 3 squares of it before the attack is resolved. The thunder damage equals 3 + your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the target only deals thunder damage to itself the first time it makes an attack before the end of your next turn.

power.title: Corrosive Mist
power.fluff: A mist of suspended acid droplets consumes your chosen foes

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each creature in the burst

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d10 + Intelligence modifier acid damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: 2 + Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus acid damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The burst creates a zone of floating droplets of acid that lasts until the end of your next turn.

Each creature that enters the zone or ends its turn in the zone takes acid damage equal to 2 + your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

power.title: Enemies Abound
power.fluff: You weave a veil of illusion over the eyes of your enemies, causing them to view their allies as threats

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each enemy in the burst

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3d6 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, the following two effects apply:
► You and allies can treat each target as an ally for the purposes of flanking.
► The target does not count as flanking you or your allies for other enemies, though it can still flank you with an enemy that is not a target.
